org.biohipi.image.io

Class CodecManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.biohipi.image.io.CodecManager

  • public final class CodecManager
extends Object
    Finds a suitable ImageEncoder or ImageDecoder for a specific BioHipiImageHeader.BioHipiImageFormat.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructor and Description
      CodecManager()

      static ImageEncoder getEncoder(BioHipiImageHeader.BioHipiImageFormat format)

      • getDecoder

        public static ImageDecoder getDecoder(BioHipiImageHeader.BioHipiImageFormat format)
                               throws IllegalArgumentException
        Find a ImageDecoder capable of deserializing a BioHipiImage object stored in a specific BioHipiImageHeader.BioHipiImageFormat.
        Parameters:
        format - storage format to assume during deserialization
        Returns:
        image decoder object
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - if format is invalid or currently unsupported

      • getEncoder

        public static ImageEncoder getEncoder(BioHipiImageHeader.BioHipiImageFormat format)
                               throws IllegalArgumentException
        Find a ImageEncoder capable of serializing a BioHipiImage to a target BioHipiImageHeader.BioHipiImageFormat.
        Parameters:
        format - storage format to target during serialization
        Returns:
        image encoder object
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - if format is invalid or currently unsupported
